0001011001111001 1010001011010111 1 -> sum: 1011100101010001, cout: 0
1000010000110010 1100100100010000 0 -> sum: 0100110101000010, cout: 1
1111111100101011 0001101001000110 1 -> sum: 0001100101110010, cout: 1

1110000111000010 1111100000011000 0 -> sum: 1101100111011010, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
